db:abstract.db:para: Securing the CoAP client and using it with a Qt Quick user interface.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += qml quick coap CONFIG += c++11
DEFINES += QT_DEPRECATED_WARNINGS
HEADERS += \ qmlcoapsecureclient.h
SOURCES += \ main.cpp \ qmlcoapsecureclient.cpp
DISTFILES += \ FilePicker.qml
RESOURCES += qml.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/coap/quicksecureclient INSTALLS += target
